definition: Having mixed feelings
A harsh, discordant mixture of sounds
Extremely delicate and light in a way that seems not of this world
Too great or extreme to be expressed in words
To render obscure, unclear, or unintelligible
Having a harmful effect, especially in a gradual or subtle way
Exceedingly idealistic; unrealistic and impractical
A person who acts obsequiously toward someone important in order to gain advantage
Dark, shadowy, or obscure
Present, appearing, or found everywhere
To waver between different opinions or actions; be indecisive
A soft, gentle breeze
Looking or sounding sad and dismal
Lasting for a very short time
Reserved or uncommunicative in speech; saying little
Having or showing keen mental discernment and good judgment
The occurrence of events by chance in a happy or beneficial way
Self-confidence or assurance, especially when in a demanding situation
To cause someone to feel drained of energy or vitality; weaken
Happening by accident or chance rather than design
